name: ACE: Battle Over The Sea
description:
ACE : Battle Over The Sea

Version 1.01 - 31.10.2022

A classic vertical shoot em up made by DarkGiver 

for the Amiga Blitz Basic Game Jam

You're piloting an unidentified strong and well armed turboprop plane with swiss colours (but who looks like a modernized F6F Hellcat...) in an alternate history world. 

You are fighting a non identified enemy on a strange endless sea... that's all for the plot actually :)

This version includes 4 missions with increasing difficulty.

To survive try to never stay static... 

Be patient and try to keep your fire power bonus for the next mission.... 

The highest score still need to be determinated...

Good Luck !!!

I hope you will enjoy it as much i enjoyed creating it (i learned so much doing it...)

Minimum system requirements : Amiga PAL OCS/ECS with 1MB Chip Memory

Tested on Amiga 500, Amiga 1200, A500 Pistorm and various configurations in WinUAE

It can be launched directly from workbench or by booting directly on included ADF floppy image or with the included WDHload version.

The game requires a classic amiga one button joystick plugged in port 2

Ingame key : 
  • P to pause the game
  • ESC to quit and return to title screen and/or to QUIT the game and return to Workbench
Credits:
  • Thanks to Adnz for arrangement of the main theme and precious advices with protracker music composition (as i'm a beginner with it).
Greetings :
  • Amiga Blitz Basic Jam - Discord Community
  • Halifax Steel-Alive - Discord Community
  • Rodrik Studio - Discord Community
  • Old Computers & Consoles Club - Switzerland (OCCC)

Thanks to all !

Production  :
  • Coded on Amiga 1200/030 and WinUAE in Blitz 2.1 using SuperTED 2.52
  • Music composed with Protracker 2.3F 
  • All graphics made with Deluxe Paint IV
  • ADF version executable packed with PowerPackerPro 4.2
Technical Notes : 

Project sources can be compiled using normal blitz basic 2.1 installation but it needs protracker sound library installed to manage sounds and music correctly. 

The version used is ptplayer v5.3 by Earok
